channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Anyone know how to make a player limit for source CHEEZESCAPE PK
Because over 17 people really lag my server side but not other people but for me it a lagg server when 2 many r on but for them its lagg free!
If im crazy speller or typer dont piss this tread off!

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

Look for public static int MaxConnections = 100000; and change it to want ever you want…you will find it in server.java and if you want 17 people it would be

public static int MaxConnections = 17;

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Server.java maxconnections?

Or put action timers on the things they’re massing on.

Read full topic
